channel.title: Change text it says when you aare in wildy?
channel.description: How do i change the text it says when your are in wild? (under the skull)

item.title: Change text it says when you aare in wildy?
item.dc:creator: @reeper620 reeper620
item.description:
@reeper620 wrote:

Here what to do… ignore doggiedoo86 hes got no life

  1. Open the notepad file called Client
  2. Hit Ctrl and F key and a search box will come up
  3. Type in the search box badmankan and it should appear high-lighted
  4. Delete the badmankan and change it to what you want it to say
  5. Save the changes and click on compile (YOUR SERVER NEEDS TO BE OFF FIRST)
  6. Type C in when the compile box comes up
  7. Wait for it to say “Compile Successful” and type R to run the server
  8. Thank me!

hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: Change text it says when you aare in wildy?

item.title: Change text it says when you aare in wildy?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

… Go to your client.java, and if you had pimpscape, it should say near the skull “pimp” or “phone”… Search for that in your client.java by hitting ctrl+f, change the “pimp” or “phone” yto what ever you want it to say

Hope it helps
